- Location: Ceiling-mounted HVAC vent/grille in interior room; metal frame with two louvered blade sets.
- Materials: Painted steel grille; drywall/plaster ceiling with textured finish.
- Condition: Dust/dirt visible on blades; brown staining along left edge of frame; screws appear secure.
- Potential issues: Airflow may be reduced from grime; staining could indicate past moisture if persists.
- Recommendations: Clean grille and blades; inspect duct/ceiling area for moisture or mold; reseal frame if needed.
